title: How Traffic Really Flows Inside an AWS VPC
subject: DevOps
shortDescription: A clear, practical explanation of how internet traffic enters an AWS VPC, flows through ALB, private subnets, security groups, NACLs, and safely reaches backend workloads using real-world production architecture.
author: Kunal Deepak Patil
